ygData.subject: Re: Color Flux
ygData.msgSnippet: This is debateable, but the effect is anywhere between 5 seconds and 5 minutes (I ve had it seem to last a while).  It casts very fast like tashan, but its
ygData.messageBody:
This is debateable, but the effect is anywhere between 5 seconds and 5 minutes (I've had it seem to last a while). It casts very fast like tashan, but its recast rate is terribly slow. I suppose this is to compensate for the extremely low mana usage of it... were it fast recasting, we could sit in a fight and keep the MOb stunned steadily while our friends beat it silly. It has saved my life several times.

Cogg - Rallos Zek
----- Original Message -----
From: Andy Geneslaw
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Sent: Sunday, July 25, 1999 11:23 AM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Color Flux


How long does this spell's effect last, and how long does it take to cast/recast?
